title: GD PEASANTS REJOICE, THE 2ND GOAT IS HERE
body:
Dont you know that absolute power leads to ultimate peace? Power aint nothing if you dont use it. The forum is lost. All this pain and suffering. Its time for someone to take control. Its time for a man to use absolute power for ultimate peace. It is time for man to become god where god has failed. You think its mere coincidence that you dont have father, friend, or master? All of them were sacrificed. You haters stand before me now for the same reason. Loathing, scheming, resenting. Destiny designed me to be the best. Ha, now you get it. There's no one else that this sacred title belongs to. Its just me. Then and only then will ultimate power be bestowed from a mystery beyond human understanding. I think you haters knew, I think you knew that you had to do something before I ascended beyond your weak human limits.

I

WILL

BE

GOD

http://i.imgur.com/enRcS5s.png/img

_**FOR GODS NEVER DIE**_

HUMANS FEAR WHAT THEY CANNOT UNDERSTAND, THEY DESPISE IT

LOOK UP TO THE 2ND GOAT PEASANTS AND REPENT

I THE STRONGEST THERE IS KIDS.

#TEAMBACON

http://i.imgur.com/4C8aLXj.jpg/img

HATERS WHATS IT LIKE KNOWING I VALIDATE YOUR EXISTENCE ON THIS FORUM. YOU FOOLS, YOU CURSE AND YOU FLAME ALL AGAINST MY NAME.
I AM THE GOD OF GD.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rYmsjocHajI

I HAVE YOU GD PUPPETS MAKING TEAMS TO TRY AND RIVAL TEAMBACON.
BUT YOU NERDS ARENT EVEN CLOSE

I AM THE UNDISPUTED BEST

THE 2ND GOAT

https://i.makeagif.com/media/6-04-2015/ZehY5B.gif

http://i.imgur.com/T8JDvze.jpg/img

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BLnpA_bxMy8

The 2nd G.O.A.T has returned. Now the haters are going to cry for me to stop stealing Bacon's shtick. But i have broken no rule, but made this as a tribute to his greatness. Oh and shoutout to Tamat.
